General.Name: Nantong Jinghua Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Jinghua Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of APIs and pharmaceutical intermediates in China. Its primary products include Phenylbutazone, Primidone, Phenobarbital, Fluorouracil, Propylthiouracil, Piroxicam, and Flucytosine APIs. The company was formerly known as Nantong Jinghua Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1957 and is based in Nantong, China.
General.Address: No 2-02#, Xrd Between 3 Haibin Rd & 2 To, Nantong, China, 226407
